actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to modify the Expanded East Coast Plan for the purpose of reducing aviation noise in the States of New York and New Jersey, and for other purposes.
short_title: Expanded East Coast Plan Rollback Act of 1993

summary.text: Expanded East Coast Plan Rollback Act of 1993 - Directs the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration (Administrator) to modify the Expanded East Coast Plan by rerouting aircraft routes over the Atlantic Ocean and, when that is not practicable, rerouting such aircraft to air routes used before adoption of the Plan, as a means of reducing aviation noise in the States of New York and New Jersey. Requires the Administrator to issue a supplemental environmental impact statement to include the effects of such modifications. Requires the Administrator to report to the Congress a description of such modifications.

titles.title: Expanded East Coast Plan Rollback Act of 1993

To direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to modify the Expanded East Coast Plan for the purpose of reducing aviation noise in the States of New York and New Jersey, and for other purposes.
